param.name: published
param.label: Publish
param.description: Select publish status of this type. Unpublished type will not display.

param.name: value
param.label: Type
param.description: Input the type. Type is the title for this like (e.g. Like, Love, Hate, Dislike)

param.name: icon
param.label: Icon
param.description: Select the image file to be used as the type icon source.

param.name: class
param.label: CSS Class
param.description: Input the CSS class to render an icon display.

param.name: ordering
param.label: Ordering
param.description: Select the ordering of this type. Ordering determines what order the type displays in the dropdown.
